items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the cable handle with both hands in front of your chest.
Step forward with your left foot and pivot on your right foot, rotating your body to the left.
As you pivot, extend your arms and push the cable handle away from your body.
Jump and turn your body 180 degrees in the air, landing with your right foot forward and your left foot back.
As you land, pull the cable handle back towards your chest and return to the starting position.
Repeat the exercise, stepping forward with your right foot and pivoting to the right.
Targets multiple muscle groups including the chest, shoulders, triceps, and core
Improves upper body strength and stability
Increases power and explosiveness in the chest and shoulders
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
Engages the core muscles for added stability and balance
Can be performed with minimal equipment and space
